name: frcdashboard
description: [](https://github.com/FRCDashboard/FRCDashboard) # FRC Dashboard FRC Dashboard is a fully customizable dashboard for [FIRST Robotics Competition (FRC)](http://firstinspires.org/robotics/frc) which is based on web languages (JavaScript/CSS/HTML). It's completely legal for competition, and can be used to give your whole drive team significantly richer control of your robot.
